org.apache.nutch.protocol.ftp

Class Ftp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.nutch.protocol.ftp.Ftp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, Pluggable, Protocol

    public class Ftp
extends java.lang.Object
implements Protocol
    Ftp.java deals with ftp: scheme. Configurable parameters are defined under "FTP properties" section in ./conf/nutch-default.xml or similar.
    Author:
    John Xing
